body_html: The values I'm fetching aren't constant as the graph involves a random sampling operation. I quickly try just commenting out the check, but I ran into #11275 (or something similar, I'm using seq2seq.dynamic_decode), so it looks I won't actually be able to compile my particular graph until there's more support for loops anyway. If that happens before this, then I think I've got a parameter or two that it could make sense to turn into an input/fetch instead of a constant as a work around.

body: The values I'm fetching aren't constant as the graph involves a random sampling operation. I quickly try just commenting out the check, but I ran into #11275 (or something similar, I'm using seq2seq.dynamic_decode), so it looks I won't actually be able to compile my particular graph until there's more support for loops anyway. If that happens before this, then I think I've got a parameter or two that it could make sense to turn into an input/fetch instead of a constant as a work around.
